title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2394 - Prompt Hearing Procedure Regarding Predecision Warrants And Warrants Issued Pursuant To Jeopardy Assessments
content:

§ 2394.7 - Conduct of a prompt hearing
§ 2394.8 - Burden of proof
§ 2394.9 - Decision of the State Tax Commission
§ 2394.10 - Effect of decision
§ 2394.11 - Consolidation of hearings
§ 2394.12 - Stay of sale
§ 2394.13 - Priority of scheduling

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2394

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171[1st], [21st]; 280-a[11]; 295; 436; 509 [7]; 697[a]; 722; 962[d] 1007[b]; 1096[b];1142[1]; 1218; 1250; 1312[a]; 1468; 1519

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
